data.name: Graceful Explosion Machine Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Graceful Explosion Machine Original Soundtrack is an audio journey from Magentos Prime to Aurum Tau and beyond. Analog synths and driving rhythms help you blast your way through enemies without losing your cool. Over an hour and twenty minutes of music, seventeen tracks in all, featuring music from each of the four planets and more!

Track List:
1. MagPri86a - [ stranded ] (03:49)
2. MagPri86b - [ weapons on lock ] (04:31)
3. MagPri86c - [ missile heaven ] (04:52)
4. MagPri86d - [ warp one ] (05:11)
5. QuaCat59a - [ memorial ] (04:52)
6. QuaCat59b - [ firewall ] (04:18)
7. QuaCat59c - [ snakes ] (04:05)
8. QuaCat59d - [ warp two ] (04:52)
9. 47-45-4d - [ TRANSMISSION INTERMISSION ] (03:48)
10. ScarEp28a - [ tough to digest ] (04:28)
11. ScarEp28b - [ baby boom ] (05:40)
12. ScarEp28c - [ chase ] (04:11)
13. ScarEp28d - [ warp three ] (05:05)
14. AurTau76a - [ el dorado ] (05:03)
15. AurTau76b - [ pulsar ] (05:03)
16. AurTau76c - [ enemy at the gates ] (05:18)
17. AurTau76d - [ warp four ] (07:31)
